---
title: "Run all Scripts"
---

## Summary 

This script contains code to run all 

```{r}
library(here)
source(here("code", "models", "mrp", "helpers.R"))

rmd_files <- list.files(path = file.path(here("code/models/mrp/")), pattern=".Rmd")   

rmd_files <- rmd_files[!rmd_files %in% "00_run_all.Rmd"]

for (cur_file in rmd_files[7:7]) {
	cat("================================\n")
	tictoc::tic(glue::glue("Finished with {cur_file}, time:"))
	cat("Running ", cur_file, "\n")
  	source_rmd(cur_file)
  	tictoc::toc()
	cat("================================\n")
}
```
